title: AI in Trading and analyzing data.
description: Human trader can get an intelligent machines insight, to make  decisions based on the merger of 2 intelligences, increasing profitability.
solution:
An AI model that is self feeding. Meaning it is incentived every time it predicts a profit against btc and eth of 30% in a week. 
Index ROI
experience: Our AI platform is completed and LIVE we want to merge with nami wallet. Apart from this we want to create the above model and implement it.
